<noinclude>These are parameters for [[NextHighestCeilingAt]] and [[NextLowestFloorAt]].

</noinclude>*{{c|double '''x'''}}
:X position
*{{c|double '''y'''}}
:Y position
*{{c|double '''bottomz'''}}
:The absolute Z position of the lowest point of the search region.
*{{c|double '''topz'''}}
:The absolute Z position of the highest point  of the search region.
*{{c|int '''flags'''}}
:Possible flags:
:*{{c|FFCF_ONLYSPAWNPOS}}
:*{{c|FFCF_SAMESECTOR}}
:*{{c|FFCF_ONLY3DFLOORS}} - includes 3D midtexes
:*{{c|FFCF_3DRESTRICT}} - ignore 3D midtexes and floors whose floorz are above thing's z
:*{{c|FFCF_NOPORTALS}} - ignore portals (considers them impassable.)
:*{{c|FFCF_NOFLOOR}}
:*{{c|FFCF_NOCEILING}}
:*{{c|FFCF_RESTRICTEDPORTAL}} - current values in the iterator's return are through a restricted portal type (i.e. some features are blocked.)
:*{{c|FFCF_NODROPOFF}} - Caller does not need a dropoff (saves some time when checking portals)
